definitions.NACK: refresh couldn’t be ingested and could happen because the incremental refresh being shared for specific provider(s) / location(s) / item(s) are not found on the buyer NP cache or for other reasons. Buyer NP should use these error codes / message in the NACK response:
definitions.above: preference is to display this menu item from Monday to Friday from 1800 to 2200; if not specified, indicates preference for displaying this menu item as per store timings;
definitions.for: the provider, of type "custom_group" for this id;
definitions.of: delivery / pickup timings to be consistent with online order timings;
